midi-qol.ItemDeleteCheck.Name: Item Delete Check
midi-qol.ItemDeleteCheck.Hint: Open a confirmation dialog when trying to delete items from character sheet
midi-qol.DamageImmunities.Name: Apply Damage immunities
midi-qol.DamageImmunities.Hint: When using midi-qol damage buttons or auto applying damage apply target's damage immunities/vulnerabilities/resistances. All damage types are checked.
midi-qol.WorldKeyMappings.Name: World vs Client Key Configuration
midi-qol.WorldKeyMappings.Blurb1: Key mappings are defined per client. Each player can have different key mappings. To force all clients to have the same key mappings use one of the available modules to enforce common settings.
midi-qol.WorldKeyMappings.Blurb2: I have tested 'Force Client Controls' with success
midi-qol.SpeedAbilityRolls.Name: Enable Speed Ability (save/check/skill) Rolls
midi-qol.ShowItemDetails.Name: Show Item details in chat card
midi-qol.ShowItemDetails.Hint: If set the item details will be displayed in the chat card. You can use the DND5E system setting to auto hide the description
midi-qol.AutoRollAttack.Name: When item is rolled, automatically roll the attack if there is one
midi-qol.AutoRollAttack.Hint: When the attack is rolled the auto fast forward roll settings are used to decide what to do
midi-qol.AutoFastForward.Name: Auto fast forward rolls
midi-qol.AutoFastForward.Hint: When rolling attack or damage always fast forward rolls also applies when clicking on attack/damage buttons
midi-qol.AutoCheckHit.Name: Auto check if attack hits target
midi-qol.AutoCheckHit.Hint: Check if an attack roll hits selected targets - damage is rolled if one or more targets is hit and auto roll damage is enabled. If disabled midi-qol will assume the attack hits and continue rolling.
midi-qol.RequiresTargets.Name: Require targets to be selected
midi-qol.RequiresTargets.Hint: Require tokens to be targeted before rolls. Never means never require targets to be set, In Combat means only in combat and always whenever an item with targets is rolled. Does not work with better rolls
midi-qol.AutoApplyDamage.Name: Auto apply damage to target
midi-qol.AutoApplyDamage.Hint: Auto apply damage to hit targets (if autocheck hits on) or targets user has selected
midi-qol.PlayerDamageCard.Name: Show a players' damage card
midi-qol.PlayerDamageCard.Hint: A simpler version of the damage card. Only displayed if the GM card is displayed. Card is not shown to the GM
midi-qol.PlayerCardDamageDifferent.Name: Display the player damage card if the rolled damage does not match the applied damage for some target
midi-qol.ItemRollButtons.Name: Add attack/damage buttons to item inventory list
midi-qol.ItemRollButtons.Hint: Add Roll Buttons to item description - these buttons support ctl/alt/shift to skip the dialog
midi-qol.AddChatDamageButtons.Name: Add damage buttons to chat message
midi-qol.AddChatDamageButtons.Hint: Add Damage buttons to any damage roll chat message - clicking applies damage to all selected tokens (NOT TARGETED) (the same as the drop down menu)
midi-qol.AutoRollDamage.Name: Auto roll Damage
midi-qol.AutoRollDamage.Hint: Automatically roll Damage when an attack roll is made. If auto roll damage is set to attack-hits it will roll damage if no targets are selected, the attack hits (see auto check hits) or hits are not being checked
midi-qol.AutoCheckSaves.Name: Auto check Saves
midi-qol.AutoCheckSaves.Hint: Automatically check saving throws when a saving throw is required. If disabled it will assume that all targets failed their save.
midi-qol.DisplaySaveDC.Name: Display Saving throw DC
midi-qol.DisplaySaveDC.Hint: If false hide the DC of the saving throw from the players (Merge card only)
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargets.Name: Untarget at end of turn
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargets.Hint: At the end of you turn choose which targets to automatically untarget
midi-qol.noItemNamed: Your selected token does not have an item named
midi-qol.noTokens: Cannot apply effect - no token targeted
midi-qol.HideNPCNames.Name: Hide token names
midi-qol.HideNPCNames.Hint: Hide token names in hit/save chat messages
midi-qol.AutoTarget.Name: Auto target on template draw
midi-qol.AutoTarget.Hint: When placing a template (e.g. spell) auto target tokens inside the template. If 'Center + Levels' is set in ranged targeting Levels Volumetric Templates will be used (if installed)
midi-qol._comment for translators_noDama: In foundry v9 the array json element is no longer supported, so only the v9 version will be used
midi-qol.noDamageonSaveSpellsv9: Acid Splash, Sword Burst, Thunderclap, Vicious Mockery, Create Bonfire, Lightning Lure, Poison Spray, Cordon of Arrow, Disintegrate, Sacred Flame, Cordon of Arrows, Frostbite,  Infestation, Toll the Dead, Word of Radiance, Catapult,  Earth Tremor
midi-qol._comment for translators_fullDa: Both of text lines below are searched for by midi in the spell description
midi-qol.noGM: No GM user connected cannot apply effects/update Hit Points
midi-qol.showGM.Name: GM Sees all whispered messages
midi-qol.showGM.Hint: GM sees all whispered messages sent even if the game settings say the GM won't see them
midi-qol.ColoredBorders.Name: Colored Border Messages
midi-qol.ColoredBorders.Hint: Each chat message has a border in the player characters color
midi-qol.AutoEffects.Name: Auto apply item effects
midi-qol.AutoEffects.Hint: Automatically apply item active effects to targets if they are hit, failed a save or don't get a save. Requires Dynamic Active Effects (DAE) and works better with about-time and or times-up as well.

midi-qol.AutoEffectsOptions.applyNoButton: Apply effects do not show button

midi-qol.RangeTarget.Name: Auto target for ranged target spells/attacks
midi-qol.RangeTarget.Hint: Auto target for ranged target types if the target type is creature/enemy/ally
midi-qol.PlayerRollSaves.Name: Prompt Players to Roll Saves
midi-qol.PlayerRollSaves.Hint: Players Roll saves. A whispered chat message or can use LMRTFY if installed.
midi-qol.rollNPCSaves.Name: Prompt GM to Roll Saves (Unlinked)
midi-qol.rollNPCLinkedSaves.Name: Prompt GM to Roll Saves (Linked)
midi-qol.rollNPCSaves.Hint: Auto means the module will roll the save for the NPC, otherwise the GM will receive an LMRTFY prompt.
midi-qol.PlayerSaveTimeout.Name: Delay before rolling for players
midi-qol.PlayerSaveTimeout.Hint: How long to wait before taking over the player's save for them in seconds
midi-qol._comment for translators_halfDa: The text below is searched for by midi in the spell description
The text below is searched for by midi in the spell description
midi-qol._comment for translators_noDama: Both text lines below are searched for by midi in the spell description
midi-qol.PreRollChecks.Name: Experimental: Apply checks before doing speed/macro roll
midi-qol.PreRollChecks.Hint: Experimental: Checks before doing an item roll; currently in range and roller has > 0 HP
midi-qol.noTargets: You must target a token before rolling the attack
midi-qol.wrongNumberTargets: You must target at most {allowedTargets} token(s) before rolling the attack
midi-qol.UseTokenNames.Name: Chat cards use token name
midi-qol.UseTokenNames.Hint: Chat card titles and target names use the token name rather than the actor name
midi-qol.CriticalDamage.Name: Choose critical damage
midi-qol.CriticalDamage.Hint: DND5e Settings Only - standard dnd5e critical roll, Max Normal Damage - base weapon dice only (no critical dice) but all maximised, Max Critical Dice - critical dice maximised, Max All Dice - item + critical dice maximised, double dice value - result of dice x2, Explode Critical Dice - roll normal critical exploding any critical dice, Only Weapon Extra Critical - the only bonus damage for critical is from the item extra critical field
midi-qol.MergeCard.Name: Merge Rolls to one card
midi-qol.MergeCard.Hint: Merge Attack, Hits, Damage, Saves to a single chat card
midi-qol.MergeCardCondensed.Name: Condense Attack/Damage Rolls
midi-qol.MergeCardCondensed.Hint: Conserve a little chat log space by making attack and damage rolls smaller
midi-qol.CheckSaveText.Name: Search item description
midi-qol.CheckSaveText.Hint: Search item description for save type - 'half as much damage' and if present spell does 1/2 damage on save. If unchecked assume a save does default save modifier damage
midi-qol.noAttackRoll: You must roll the attack before rolling the damage
midi-qol.Hint: Configure the various workflow settings for midi-qol. Be warned there are lots of them
midi-qol.DiceSound.Name: Attack Roll
midi-qol.DiceSounds.Hint: Sound to play for different sorts of rolls. ONLY applies to the combo card
midi-qol.CustomSoundsPlaylist.Name: Sound Playlist
midi-qol.WeaponUseSound.Name: Weapon Use
midi-qol.WeaponUseSoundRanged.Name: Weapon Use (Ranged)
midi-qol.SpellUseSound.Name: Spell Use
midi-qol.PotionUseSound.Name: Potion Use
midi-qol.SpellUseSoundRanged.Name: Spell Use (Ranged)
midi-qol.ItemUseSound.Name: Item Use
midi-qol.AutoFastForwardAbilityRolls.Hin: Clicking on an ability to start a check/save or a skill roll will auto fast forward
midi-qol.UseCustomSounds.Name: Enable midi-qol custom sounds
midi-qol.UseCustomSounds.Hint: If set will override system sounds. Configure sounds from the 'Configure Midi Custom Sounds' Application
midi-qol:Debug.Name: Enable Debug
midi-qol:Debug.Hint: 'Warnings' gives an overview of activity, 'debug' adds more info and 'all' turns on CONFIG.debug.hooks as well

midi-qol.rollNPCSavesOptions.letme: Let Me Roll That For You

midi-qol.playerRollSavesOptions.letme: Let Me Roll That For You

midi-qol.playerRollSavesOptionsReduced.letme: Let Me Roll That For You

midi-qol.AutoRemoveTargetsOptions.all: untarget all at end of turn

midi-qol.hideRollDetailsOptions.detailsDSN: Roll Formula but show DSN roll

midi-qol.HideRollDetails.Name: GM Roll details hiding
midi-qol.HideRollDetails.Hint: Choose how much of GM rolls to hide/show to players

midi-qol.HideRollDetails.HintLong.detailsDSN: Roll Formula but show DSN: Hide the roll formulas but still roll DSN dice
midi-qol.HideRollDetails.HintLong.details: Roll Formula: hide the roll formula and don't show DSN dice
midi-qol.HideRollDetails.HintLong.d20Only: Show Attack d20 + damage total: Show the attack d20 Roll and damage total only
midi-qol.HideRollDetails.HintLong.hitDamage: Show Hit/Miss + damage total: Show hit/miss plus the damage total
midi-qol.HideRollDetails.HintLong.d20attackOnly: Show attack D20 Only: Show the d20 attack dice only
midi-qol.HideRollDetails.HintLong.all: Entire Roll: hide all roll details from the players

midi-qol.ForceHideRoll.Name: Really Hide private/blind/self rolls
midi-qol.ForceHideRoll.Hint: Display nothing to non-recipients for private/blind/self rolls. Thanks to felix.mueller.86@web.de
midi-qol.EnableWorkflow.Name: Enable roll automation support
midi-qol.EnableWorkflow.Hint: If enabled automation of rolls can be configured in the Workflow Settings panel
midi-qol.Debug.Name: Enable debug
midi-qol.Debug.Hint: Set to None unless you want to fill up the console log. All enables CONFIG.hooks.debug
midi-qol.AllowUseMacro.Name: Add item on use macro to sheet
midi-qol.AllowActorUseMacro.Name: Add actor on use macro to sheet
midi-qol.AllowUseMacro.Hint: When enabled adds a macro name field which will be called on use. See the Readme for the details

midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.preItemRoll: Called before the item is rolled (*)
midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.templatePlaced: Only called once a template is placed
midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.isAttacked: Actor is target of an attack
midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.isHit: Actor is target of a hit
midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.preTargetSsave: Target is about to roll a saving throw
midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.preApplyTargetDamage: Target is about to be damaged by an item
midi-qol.onUseMacroOptions.isDamaged: Actor is damaged by an attack

midi-qol.DragDropTarget.Name: Drag and Drop Targeting
midi-qol.DragDropTarget.Hint: Allow dragging an item onto a token to attack it
midi-qol.AutoAttack.Name: Auto roll attack
midi-qol.AutoDamage.Name: Auto roll damage
midi-qol.AutoFastForwardAttack.Name: Auto fast forward attack
midi-qol.AutoFastForwardDamage.Name: Auto fast forward damage
midi-qol.ItemList: Choose items which display details on item card
midi-qol.RollOtherDamage.Name: Roll Other damage formula for rwak/mwak
midi-qol.RollOtherSpellDamage.Name: Roll Other damage formula for spells
midi-qol.RollOtherDamage.Hint: Off = Don't roll Other damage automatically. ifSave = only roll the Other damage if the item has a save. Activation = roll the Other damage if the activation condition is empty or evaluates to true
midi-qol.RemoveButtons.Name: Remove chat card buttons after roll
midi-qol.ActiveConcentrationSpell.Title: Active Concentration Spell
midi-qol.ActiveConcentrationSpell.Conten: You are already concentrating on @NAME@. End concentration and continue?
You are already concentrating. End concentration and continue?
midi-qol.ConcentrationAutomation.Name: Enable Concentration Automation
midi-qol.ConcentrationAutomation.Hint: If enabled will handle concentration management via midi-qol, requires auto check saves to be enabled. Will disable CUB concentration management
midi-qol.SingleConcentrationRoll.Name: Single Concentration Check
midi-qol.SingleConcentrationRoll.Hint: If enabled and the attack is rolling normal damage + a save + other/versatile damage only roll a single concentration check for the combined damage
If enabled loss of temporary HP will trigger a concentration check
midi-qol.RemoveConcentrationEffects.Name: Remove concentration when effecs removed
midi-qol.RemoveConcentrationEffects.Hint: Check when effects (effects & templates) are removed. If all effects and templates for the concentration spell/feature have been removed remove concentrtion
midi-qol.DamageMacro.Name: Bonus Damage Macros
midi-qol.DamageMacro.Hint: Comma separated list of macros to call when calculating damage which will be applied when calculating damage to targets
midi-qol.AttackMacro.Name: Attack Bonus Macros
midi-qol.AttackMacro.Hint: Comma separated list of macros to call when calculating attack roll which will be applied when checking if the attack hit the targets
midi-qol.OptionalRules.Name: Optional Game Rules
midi-qol.OptionalRules.Hint: DND5E Game rules that you may wish to enable. Generally don't work with better rolls.
midi-qol.InvisAdvantage.Name: Hidden/Invisible attackers have advantage (disadvantage if they cannot see their target) on attacks (use CV/CE/CUB and core foundy vision)
midi-qol.CheckRange.Name: Check weapon range when attacking
midi-qol.NearbyFoe.Name: Ranged attacks when a foe is closer than this have disadvantage. 0 disables
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Name: Walls block ranged attacks
midi-qol.WallsBlockRange.Hint:
Walls block ranged attacks 
 No = no effect, center = check center to center line, center + Levels = center check but use the 'levels' module to determine wall blocking. Center + Levels also means use levels volumetric templates for template targeting
midi-qol.NearbyAllyRanged.Name: (House Rule) Ranged Attacks at foes near allies have disadvantage.
midi-qol.CoverCalculation.Name: Calculate Cover
midi-qol.CoverCalculation.Hint: Calculate AC bonus for targets in cover - settings taken from the selected module
midi-qol.NearbyAllyRanged.Hint: Ranged Attacks with allies nearby (5 feet) to the target have disadvantage for targets smaller than this (w*h). 0 disables
midi-qol.Incapacitated.Name: Incapacitated actors can't take actions or reactions
midi-qol.RemoveHiddenInvis.Name: Attacking removes hidden (use CE/CV/CUB/core foundry specialStatus )
midi-qol.CriticalSaves.Name: (House Rule) Critical/Fumble always succeed/fail for saving throws
midi-qol.MaxDRValue.Name: (House rule) Enabling this means that only the most effective Damage Reduction will apply. Off means DR accumulates
midi-qol.KeepRollStats.Name: Keep Roll Statistics
midi-qol.KeepRollStats.Hint: Record attack and damage roll data for actors
midi-qol.SaveStatsEvery.Name: Save statistics Every
midi-qol.SaveStatsEvery.Hint: Save statistics every N rolls. Each attack and damage counts as a roll. Suggest 10-20 or greater
midi-qol.PlayerStatsOnly.Name: Player statistics only
midi-qol.PlayerStatsOnly.Hint: Only keep statistics for player owned actors
midi-qol.DefaultSaveMult.Name: Default saving throw multiplier
midi-qol.DefaultSaveMult.Hint: If there are no other modifiers a saving throw will do this fraction of the damage of the original attack. Default 0.5, half damage on save. You should only change this if you know how multipliers work
midi-qol.RequireMagical.Name: Require 'Magical' property
midi-qol.RequireMagical.Hint: Magical Property is either the weapon property 'Magical' or the midi-qol 'magic dam' property and if set the item does magical damage. 'Off' non-weapons do magical damage by default, weapons do magical damage if attack bonus > 0. 'Non Spell' means only spells do magical damage by default. 'All' no item does magical damage by default
midi-qol.RemoveConcentration.Name: Remove concentration on failed save
midi-qol.RemoveConcentration.Hint: If enabled concentration will be removed on a failed save when damage taken otherwise must be removed manually
midi-qol.UsePlayerPortrait.Name: Use Actor portrait in chat cards
midi-qol.UsePlayerPortrait.Hint: For Actors of type character use the actor portrait instead of the token image in midi-qol chat cards
midi-qol.DistanceIncludesHeight.Name: Include height difference in distance calculations
midi-qol.NoSocketLib: Midi-qol requires socketlib installed and enabled
midi-qol.NoCubInstalled: You have enabled midi-qol concentration automation. This requires that you install and activate Combat Utility Belt as well. Concentration Automation will be disabled.
midi-qol.ExportConfig: Export midi-qol settings to json file
midi-qol.ImportConfig: Import midi-qol settings from json file
midi-qol.ExportJSon: Export Roll Stats to Json file
midi-qol.ExportCSV: Export Roll Stats to CSV file

midi-qol.AutoCEEffectsOptions.itempri: Apply Item effects, if absent apply CE
midi-qol.AutoCEEffectsOptions.cepri: Apply CE, if absent apply item effects

midi-qol.AutoCEEffects.Name: Apply Convenient Effects
midi-qol.AutoCEEffects.Hint: Apply convenient effects which match item name when item used. Requires auto apply active effects enabled as well.
midi-qol.NoChangelogs: Midi-qol supports and recommends the ChangeLogs or Module Manager+ modules to show you any changes since you last updated
midi-qol.ActiveDefence.Name: Active Defence
midi-qol.ActiveDefence.Hint: Instead of GM rolling 'To Hit' rolls players make a defence roll. Requires LMRTFY and does not work with better rolls
midi-qol.PromptDamageRoll.Name: Enhanced Damage Roll Dialog
midi-qol.PromptDamageRoll.Hint: When using Damage Roll Dialog display an enhanced dialog that supports choosing item damage.
midi-qol.GMHide3dDice.Name: Hide GM attack/damage/saving throw 3d dice rolls - overrides other settings (merge card only)
midi-qol.GhostRolls.Name: For attack/damage rolls display with 'dice so nice ghost rolls' rather than hiding the roll (merge card only)
midi-qol.ConsumeResource.Name: Skip consume resource dialog
midi-qol.ConsumeResource.Hint: If set skip the consume resource dialog (consuming a default resource/spell slot and place templates) unless no spell slot of the correct level is available, or the Advantage + Disadvantage keys are pressed when clicking
midi-qol.ChallengeModeArmor.Name: Enable Challenge Mode Armor Class
midi-qol.ChallengeModeArmorScale.Name: Enable house version Challenge Mode Armor Class
midi-qol.ChallengeModeArmor.Hint: Implements the challenge mode armor rules - see the readme for more information
midi-qol.ChallengeModeArmorScale.Hint: Requires Challenge Mode Armor enabled. Implements a modified challenge mode armor rules - see the readme for more information
midi-qol.EffectActivation: Activation Condition true required for effect activation
midi-qol.ddbGL.Name: Enable ddb-game-log support
midi-qol.ddbGL.Hint: Accept attack/damage/saving throws from ddb-game-log to trigger midi workflows in foundry
midi-qol.ShowReactionChatMessage.Name: Show Chat prompt for reactions
midi-qol.reactionFlavorPreAttack: {actorName} is attacked by {itemName} and can use a reaction
midi-qol.reactionFlavorAttack: {actorName} is hit by {itemName} and can use a reaction
midi-qol.reactionFlavorDamage: {actorName} is damaged by {itemName} and can use a reaction
midi-qol.AccelKeysOverride.Name: Midi-qol speed keys override others
midi-qol.AccelKeysOverride.Hint: If set midi will always use the speed key mappings for advantage/disadvantage, instead of deferring to better rolls (for example)
midi-qol._comment for translators_DeferT: The text below is searched for by midi in the onUseMacro field in item data. If you change it every item with an onUseMacro will need to be changed to match
midi-qol._comment for translators_ItemMa: The text below is searched for by midi in the onUseMacro field in item data. If you change it every item with an onUseMacro will need to be changed to match
midi-qol.LateTargeting.Name: Late Targeting
midi-qol.LateTargeting.Hint: When rolling with auto roll attack set, items which are not AoE, Ranged or self targeting will pause and wait for targets to be selected. Switch out of targeting mode in the controls HUD

midi-qol.LateTargetingOptions.noTargetsSelected: Late Target only if none selected

midi-qol.AddDead.Name: Add effect When HP = 0
midi-qol.AddDead.Hint: NPC Add Defeated, PC Add Convenient Effect Unconscious
midi-qol.AddWounded.Name: Mark Wounded when hp falls below %
midi-qol.AddWounded.Hint: Add Custom Convenient Effect 'Wounded' when HP are less than specified percentage of max. 0 disables.
midi-qol.debugCallTiming.Name: Log execution timing
midi-qol.debugCallTiming.Hint: Provide some log information about how long things take
midi-qol.RollToggle.Hint: Toggle fast/auto roll setting for attack/damage/ability Checks
midi-qol.RollToggle.Name: Roll Toggle
midi-qol.FastForward.Name: Fast Forward
midi-qol.KeysCritical.Hint: Roll critical damage (from chat card only)
midi-qol.FixStickyKeys.Name: Fix sticky alt/ctl/shift
midi-qol.FixStickyKeys.Hint: If set midi will attempt to resolve alt/ctl/shift being stuck 'on'
midi-qol.DisplaySaveAdvantage.Name: Display if save had Advantage/Disadvantage

midi-qol.QuickSettingsBlurb.1: Quick settings let you set a combination of settings at once.
midi-qol.QuickSettingsBlurb.2: When one of the buttons below is pushed the changes are immediately made to your settings
midi-qol.QuickSettingsBlurb.3: A list of changes is displayed once the application is complete

midi-qol.Reaction.Title: Reaction Processing
midi-qol.ShowReactionAttackRoll.Name: Show attack roll
midi-qol.DoReactions.Name: Check PLAYER reactions
midi-qol.DoReactions.Hint: Give an attacked actor the option to use a reaction before adjudicating the roll. Reactions when hit require auto check hits enabled. Damage reactions if applying damage
midi-qol.GMDoReactions.Name: Check NPC/GM reactions
midi-qol.ReactionTimeout.Name: Reaction check timeout
midi-qol.ReactionTimeout.Hint: How long to wait before assuming no reaction has been taken
midi-qol.NoOptionalRules.Name: No optional rules
midi-qol.NoOptionalRules.Hint: Disable optional rules for this roll
midi-qol.RecordAOO.Name: Record Attacks of Opportunity
midi-qol.RecordAOO.Hint: When an actor makes an attack and it is not their turn in the combat tracker - mark their reaction used
midi-qol.EnforceReactions.Name: Enforce Reactions
midi-qol.EnforceReactions.Hint: Prompt when using reaction items if a reaction has already been used this round
midi-qol.EnforceBonusActions.Name: Enforce Bonus Actions
midi-qol.EnforceBonusActions.Hint: Prompt when using bonus action items if a bonus action already used this round
midi-qol.EnforceReactions.Title: Reaction Used
midi-qol.EnforceReactions.Content: You have used your reaction this round. Do you want to proceed anyway?
midi-qol.DisplayHitResultNumeric.Name: Display how much an attack hit or missed by (per target)
midi-qol.EnforceBonusActions.Title: Bonus Action Used
midi-qol.EnforceBonusActions.Content: You have used your bonus action this round. Do you want to proceed anyway?
midi-qol.SoundSettings.Name: Configure Midi Custom Sounds
midi-qol.SoundSettings.Hint: Setup midi-qol custom sounds for item rolls
midi-qol.SoundSettings.Label: Configure Midi Custom Sounds

midi-qol.SoundSettingsBlurb.2: Choose 'Create Sample playlist, which will create a playlist 'Midi Item Sounds' with a few sounds
midi-qol.SoundSettingsBlurb.4: The other create setting add more details/complexity

midi-qol.CheckFlanking.Name: Check Flanking
midi-qol.CheckFlanking.Hint:
Check if you and your allies flank the opponent. Either gives attacker advantage and/or applies CE flanking condition to

attacker

OR applies CE Flanked condition to target
midi-qol.RollAlternate.Name: Move roll formula to tooltip
midi-qol.RollAlternate.Hint: Use alternate roll display on merge card moving the roll formula to the tooltip and optionally add advantage attribution
midi-qol.OptionalCritRule.Name: (House Rule) Critical Roll Margin
midi-qol.OptionalCritRule.Hint: Attack Rolls this much above AC are critical. -1 disables
midi-qol.CriticalNat20.Name: (House Rule) Allow normal criticals
midi-qol.CriticalNat20.Hint: A roll above critical threshold is still a critical even if it does not meet the margin requirements
Don't wait for damage roll before expiring attack/hit/action special duration effects
Allow any reaction spell to be used
Do not require available spell slots or preparation when choosing reaction spells
midi-qol.DamageResistanceMultiplier.Name: Resistance reduces damage to
midi-qol.DamageImmunityMultiplier.Name: Immunity reduces damage to
midi-qol.ShowFastForward.Name: Show Fast Forward
midi-qol.ShowFastForward.Hint: Show Fast Forward indicator on attack and damage buttons
midi-qol.AutoRemoveTemplate.Name: Auto remove placed template on spell expiry
midi-qol.AttackPerTarget.Name: Roll a separate attck per target
midi-qol.itemUseHooks.Name: Utilise Item Hooks
midi-qol.itemUseHooks.Hint: Do NOT set this - used for author's testing
midi-qol.SkillAbilityCheckAdvantage.Name: Ability Check Advantage gives Skill Advantage
midi-qol.SkillAbilityCheckAdvantage.Hint: If an actor has advantage/disadvatnage on ability checks, skills based on that ability also have advatnage/disadvantage
midi-qol.HighlightSuccess.Name: Color code Hit/Miss/Save Display
midi-qol.HighlightSuccess.Hint: When displaying hits/misses, hits/saves are in green and misses/failed saves in read
midi-qol.OptionalRuleVitality.Name: (House Rule) Vitality pool
midi-qol.OptionalRuleVitality.Hint: when set to a resource damage applied to a target with 0 HP does damage to the vitality resource. If that reaches 0 the target is dead
midi-qol.AutoRerollInitiative.Name: Auto reroll initiative
midi-qol.AutoRerollInitiative.Hint: Auto reroll initiative for all combatants at the start of a new round. Warning: can break round/turn effect expiry
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.Name: Experimental: Support undoing item rolls
midi-qol.UndoWorkflow.Hint: If enabled midi will store undo data for all item rolls. Not suitable for game time. Undo via MidiQOL.undoMostRecentWorkflow()
